item.title: Inlets on the water
item.description: Introduction Before we dive into the technical aspect of this blog post there should probably be some explanation for how we got here. Like many of us, I’ve at times struggled with the balance of remote work, lockdown and my personal life. I’ve done all the usual stuff - bread baking, home IOT setup, and a lot of cycling but there was another itch which required scratching. Meet Ionic. She’s a 17 metre narrow boat, laid down in 1986.
